overview:
Since 1996 SEO Agency owner & professional Search Engine Consultant Don Gaconnet has driven himself to develop the best white-hat SEO practices for small and medium sized businesses. Don’s SEO Firmness stems from a strong dedication to provide the highest levels of SEO services at affordable rates that deliver exceptional results. Don has a Firm SEO grasp on how search engines work, what is important for website usability, and an eye for designs with higher conversions and lower bounce rates.

Thinking SEO Firms are Expensive? Don runs his SEO firm using today’s technology. Putting technology to work enables Don to build SEO campaigns that are based on your companies market. Don target’s your SEO market and builds his search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing (SEM), email marketing, PPC campaigns and internet marketing on your chosen keywords competitiveness. Doing so provides the best value option for his clients by building transparent scopes or work that deliver what his clients need and value.

Want more value than a typical SEO firm offers? Don brings 15 years of internet marketing, web design, development and information technology to successfully build SEO platforms that are creative, unique and effective. Don utilizes his talents as an SEO copywriter and combines his creative ability as an author to build an SEO Mix that is highly tactical, search engine friendly and focused on website visitor call-to-actions and increasing sales.

Did You Know Don’s an Author? Don’s published a do-it-yourself content marketing guild that he uses to build content marketing strategies that work. Don’s book is available now on Amazon.com Buy Don’s Content Marketing Book Here.
